CustomField.formula: IF( CONTAINS(TEXT(Product__c),"Intapp Time"), "Intapp Time", CASE(Product__c, "Intapp Flow","Intapp Flow", "Intapp Integrate","Intapp Integrate", "Intapp Open: Conflicts","Intapp Open: Conflicts", "Intapp Open: Intake","Intapp Open: Intake", "Intapp Open: Intake (Engagement Letters)","Intapp Open: Intake (Engagement Letters)", "Intapp Open: Terms of Business","Intapp Open: Terms of Business", "Intapp Walls","Intapp Walls", "CG Analyze","TFG", "CG Flow","TFG", "CG Protect","TFG", "LegalKEY","TFG", "RollCall","RollCall", "Error - please contact Business Operations" ) )
CustomField.label: Simple Product
